trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish command | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish 命令 | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: The dotnet-publish command publishes your .NET Core project into a directory.
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish 命令會將 .NET Core 專案發行到目錄中。

trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish, CLI, CLI command, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish, CLI, CLI 命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: dotnet-publish
trans-unit.target: dotnet-publish

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名稱

trans-unit.source: `dotnet-publish` - Packs the application and all of its dependencies into a folder getting it ready for publishing.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet-publish` - 將應用程式及其所有相依性封裝到資料夾，以準備進行發行。

trans-unit.source: Synopsis
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 說明

trans-unit.source: `dotnet publish` compiles the application, reads through its dependencies specified in the project file and publishes the resulting set of files to a directory.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet publish` 會編譯應用程式，讀取在其專案檔中指定的相依性，然後將產生的一組檔案發行到目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The output will contain the following:
trans-unit.target: 輸出會包含下列內容：

trans-unit.source: Intermediate Language (IL) code in an assembly with a `*.dll` extension.
trans-unit.target: 組件中的中繼語言 (IL) 程式碼，副檔名為 `*.dll`。

trans-unit.source: *deps.json* file that contains all of the dependencies of the project.
trans-unit.target: *deps.json* 檔案，其中包含專案的所有相依性。

trans-unit.source: *Runtime.config.json* file that specifies the shared runtime that the application expects, as well as other configuration options for the runtime (for example, garbage collection type).
trans-unit.target: *Runtime.config.json* 檔案，指定應用程式預期的共用執行階段，以及執行階段的其他組態選項 (例如記憶體回收類型)。

trans-unit.source: All of the application's dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的所有相依性。

trans-unit.source: These are copied out of the NuGet cache and into the output folder.
trans-unit.target: 這些相依性會從 NuGet 快取複製到輸出資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The `dotnet publish` command's output is ready to be deployed in a remote machine for execution and is the only officially supported way to prepare the application to be deployed to another machine (for example, a server) for execution.
trans-unit.target: `dotnet publish` 命令的輸出已準備好部署到遠端電腦開始執行，這是準備將應用程式部署到另一部電腦 (例如伺服器) 開始執行之唯一正式支援的方法。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of deployment that the project specifies, the remote machine will have to have .NET Core shared runtime installed on it.
trans-unit.target: 根據專案指定的部署類型，遠端電腦上必須已安裝 .NET Core 共用執行階段。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [.NET Core Application Deployment](../deploying/index.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Core 應用程式部署](../deploying/index.md)主題。

trans-unit.source: Arguments
trans-unit.target: 引數

trans-unit.source: The project to publish, which defaults to the current directory if `project` is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 要發行的專案，如果未指定 `project`，則預設為目前目錄。

trans-unit.source: Options
trans-unit.target: 選項

trans-unit.source: Prints out a short help for the command.
trans-unit.target: 印出命令的簡短說明。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the application for specified target framework.
trans-unit.target: 發行所指定目標架構的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The target framework has to be specified in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 必須在專案檔中指定此目標架構。

trans-unit.source: Publishes the application for a given runtime.
trans-unit.target: 發行所指定執行階段的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This is used when creating a [self-contained deployment](../deploying/index.md#self-contained-deployments-scd).
trans-unit.target: 建立[獨立性部署](../deploying/index.md#self-contained-deployments-scd)時會使用此選項。

trans-unit.source: For a list of Runtime Identifiers (RIDs) you can use, see the [RID catalog](../rid-catalog.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需您可以使用的執行階段識別項 (RID) 清單，請參閱 [RID 目錄](../rid-catalog.md)。

trans-unit.source: Default is to publish a [framework-dependented app](../deploying/index.md#framework-dependent-deployments-fdd).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為發行[架構相依應用程式](../deploying/index.md#framework-dependent-deployments-fdd)。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path where to place the directory.
trans-unit.target: 指定在其中放置目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it will default to *_./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/_* for portable applications or *_./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/[runtime]_* for self-contained deployments.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，可攜式應用程式將預設為 *_./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/_*，獨立部署則將預設為 *_./bin/[configuration]/[framework]/[runtime]_*。

trans-unit.source: Configuration to use when building the project.
trans-unit.target: 要在建置專案時使用的組態。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `Debug`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 `Debug`。

trans-unit.source: Defines what `*` should be replaced with in the version field in the project file.
trans-unit.target: 定義專案檔的 version 欄位中應該取代的 `*`。

trans-unit.source: Sets the verbosity level of the command.
trans-unit.target: 設定命令的詳細資訊層級。

trans-unit.source: Allowed values are `q[uiet]`, `m[inimal]`, `n[ormal]`, `d[etailed]`, and `diag[nostic]`.
trans-unit.target: 允許的值為 `q[uiet]`、`m[inimal]`、`n[ormal]`、`d[etailed]` 和 `diag[nostic]`。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Publish the project found in the current directory:
trans-unit.target: 發行目前目錄中找到的專案：

trans-unit.source: Publish the application using the specified project file:
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的專案檔發行應用程式：

trans-unit.source: Publish the project found in the current directory using the `netcoreapp1.1` framework:
trans-unit.target: 使用 `netcoreapp1.1` 架構發行目前目錄中找到的專案：

trans-unit.source: Publish the current application using the `netcoreapp1.1` framework and runtime for `OS X 10.10` (this RID has to exist in the project file).
trans-unit.target: 使用 `netcoreapp1.1` 架構和 `OS X 10.10` 的執行階段來發行目前應用程式 (這個 RID 必須存在於專案檔中)。

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: 請參閱

trans-unit.source: [Frameworks](../../standard/frameworks.md)
trans-unit.target: [架構](../../standard/frameworks.md)

trans-unit.target: [執行階段識別項 (RID) 目錄](../rid-catalog.md)
